name: Say You'll Always Wonder Black Hoodie
description: Black hoodie featuring 'Say You'll Always Wonder' and TTPD logo printed on front with diamond design and 'If The Glint In My Eye Traced The Depths Of Your Sigh' song lyrics and other 'Chloe or Sam or Sophia or Marcus' song lyrics and TTPD logo printed up wearer's right arm with photo of Taylor Swift and 'The Tortured Poets Department The Anthology' album title, 'So If You Wanna Break My Cold, Cold Heart Say You Loved Me And If You Wanna Tear My World Apart Say You'll Always Wonder', 'Could It Be Enough To Just Float In Your Orbit', with 'Taylor Swift' and moon phase designs printed on back.

name: TTPD V-Neck Cropped Sweater
description: Brown v-neck sweater feature TTPD logo embroidered on wearer's left chest with a white stripe on sleeve cuffs and neckline.

name: The Tortured Poets Department Black Jacket & 2 Patch Set Bundle
description: Ink black collared jacket featuring front zip with 'The Tortured Poets Department' embroidered on front left chest and 'All's Fair In Love And Poetry' embroidered on back with snaps at both wrists. Includes set of two patches ('TTPD' album logo patch and typewriter design patch). Please note, this product does not include any additional patches.

name: TTPD Black Embossed Hoodie
description: Black hoodie with front pocket featuring embossed 'TTPD' album logo on front.

name: TTPD Gray Embossed Hoodie
description: Gray hoodie with front pocket featuring embossed 'TTPD' album logo on front.

name: But Daddy I Love Him Hoodie
description: Gray hoodie with front pocket featuring 'But Daddy I Love Him' song lyrics, 'I'll Tell You Something About My Good Name It's Mine Alone To Disgrace' song lyrics, 'Taylor Swift', 'TTPD' album logo, and 'Â©2024' printed on front.

name: The Tortured Poets Department Crewneck Sweater
description: Ghosted white crewneck sweater featuring parchment beige contrast striped ribbing at collar, waist, and wrists with 'TTPD' album logo and 'The Tortured Poets Department' printed on wearer's front left chest.

name: You Need To Calm Down Hoodie
description: Gray hoodie with front pocket featuring 'Taylor Swift' with star design printed on wearer's front left chest with And 'I ain't trying to mess with your self expression' and other 'You Need To Calm Down' song lyrics printed on wearer's right sleeve and photo of Taylor Swift with 'you need to calm down' song lyrics printed on back.

name: 1989 (Taylor's Version) Pink Crewneck
description: Pink crewneck featuring 'Taylor Swift' printed on front and 1989 (Taylor's Version) photos with '1989 Taylor's Version' printed on back.

name: Red (Taylor's Version) I Remember It All Too Well Zip Polo
description: Red zip polo with cream trim at wrists and collar featuring 'Taylor Swift' in circle design printed on wearer's front left chest and 'Cause this city's barren cold I still remember the first fall of snow and how it glistened as it fell I remember it all too well' song lyrics with star design printed on back.
